fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose a player whose role has not been revealed or otherwise confirmed to shoot.
- You can do this once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- After shooting a player, their role is not revealed, nor is their will.
- Instead of a voting phase, all players bet on whether they think the shot player was innocent or guilty. Abstainers or people who run out of time will vote innocent automatically.
- If the majority of players bet correctly, the Gambler learns the role of one player of their choice that night.
